divs: Sighting DetailsFor the second time in 2 months a star like object has bless our airspace. I was watering the yard and had notice what looked like the star we normaly see in the south. I was about to look away and then noticed it moving. I would say from horizon(north) to horizon(south) it took aprox 40 seconds.It looked like a bright star moving. There were no Fed required wing light or strobes. The other time was for east to west right over my home. Anyway I am still a sceptic, untill they knock on my door and say yo.
